title: Juancho's BBQ
address: Multiple locations: Andrés Borrego 16, Alonso Cano 10 (Mercado de Chamberí), Goya 95
knownFor: Award-winning 'Bacon Juancheeseburger' and premium charcoal-grilled meats
description: Widely regarded as serving one of the best burgers in Spain. Starting as a humble market stall, Juancho's has become a cult favorite for its dry-aged beef patties and unique 'cubata' macerated bacon. The atmosphere is casual and buzzy, perfect for meat purists.
